IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: GAINESVILLE INDEPENDENT SCHOOL, INC. A.K.A. LAKEVIEW ACADEMY IS COMMITTED TO EXCELLENCE IN THE PERSONAL GROWTH AND ACADEMIC DEVELOPMENT OF THE COLLEGE-BOUND STUDENTS THROUGH A PARTNERSHIP OF SCHOOL, FAMILY, AND COMMUNITY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: GAINESVILLE INDEPENDENT SCHOOL, INC. A.K.A. LAKEVIEW ACADEMY IS A COLLEGE-PREPARATORY SCHOOL COMMITTED TO EXCELLENCE IN THE PERSONAL GROWTH AND ACADEMIC DEVELOPMENT OF TODAY'S STUDENT THROUGH A PARTNERSHIP OF SCHOOL, FAMILY, AND COMMUNITY.
IRS990.Desc: LAKEVIEW ACADEMY IS AN ACCREDITED COLLEGE PREPARATORY EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION COVERING GRADES K3 THROUGH TWELVE. LAKEVIEW IS COMMITTED TO PROVIDING THE HIGHEST COLLEGE PREPARATORY EDUCATION POSSIBLE TO THE STUDENTS OF THE SCHOOL. LAKEVIEW MAINTAINS A STUDENT BODY OF APPROXIMATELY 600 STUDENTS. LAKEVIEW IS LOCATED IN GAINESVILLE, GA.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: ATHLETICS - LAKEVIEW ACADEMY COMPETES IN THE GEORGIA INDEPENDENT ATHLETIC ASSOCIATION (GIAA) AND OFFERS BASEBALL, BASKETBALL, CHEERLEADING, CROSS COUNTRY, FOOTBALL, GOLF, SOCCER, SWIMMING, TENNIS, AND VOLLEYBALL AS TEAM SPORTS FOR GRADES 7-12. OVER 75% OF LAKEVIEW'S MIDDLE AND UPPER SCHOOL STUDENTS PARTICIPATE IN AT LEAST ONE SCHOOL-SPONSORED SPORT, AS WELL AS A FINE ARTS ACTIVITY, AND SPORTING CLAYS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: STUDENT ACTIVITIES AND SERVICES - LAKEVIEW ACADEMY IS COMMITEED TO PROVIDING OPPORTUNITIES FOR FINE ARTS, TECHNOLOGY, AND COMMUNITY SERVICE. ALL STUDENTS HAVE A VARIETY OF AFTER-SCHOOL OPPORTUNITIES FROM WHICH TO CHOOSE, INCLUDING THE SCHOOL'S AWARD-WINNING DRAMA AND ARTS PROGRAMS. LAKEVIEW STUDENTS HAVE OPPORTUNITIES TO BECOME INVOLVED IN TECHNOLOGY-RELATED ACTIVITIES AND STUDENTS IN GRADES 4-12 CAN ALSO JOIN THE SCHOOL'S AWARD-WINNING ROBOTICS TEAM, WHICH HAS BEEN RECOGNIZED AS ONE OF THE TOP TEAMS IN GEORGIA. A CENTRAL TENET OF LAKEVIEW ACADEMY IS THE SCHOOL'S COMMITMENT TO COMMUNITY SERVICE. THROUGH ACTIVE INVOLVEMENT WITH OTHERS IN THE COMMUNITY, STUDENTS LEARN THE VALUE OF SERVICE AND THE NEED TO TAKE RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE COMMUNITY IN WHICH THEY LIVE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ACADEMY HAS ADOPTED PROFESSIONAL GUIDANCE RELATED TO ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES. THE ACADEMY REGULARLY REVIEWS AND EVALUATES UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME TAX LIABILITY. MANAGEMENT HAS DETERMINED THAT THERE ARE NO CURRENT INCOME TAX LIABILITIES.
POLICY IS PRINTED ON STUDENT APPLICATION AND IS PUBLISHED ON SCHOOL WEBSITE.
THE FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE IS PROVIDED ON A NEED BASED SELECTION.

IssuerName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: GAINESVILLE AND HALL COUNTY DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY MANAGEMENT AND THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ACADEMY MONITORS THE ANNUAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURES REQUIRED BY THE OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES OF THE SCHOOL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COMMITTEE OF TRUSTEES IS CHARGED WITH THE EVALUATION AND RECOMMENDATION OF THE PERFORMANCE AND COMPENSATION OF THE HEAD OF THE SCHOOL. THE BOT MAKE RECOMMENDATIONS TO THE BOARD FOR APPROVAL BY THE BOARD. THE HEAD OF SCHOOL IS CHARGED WITH EVALUATION OF ALL OTHER EMPLOYEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ACADEMY'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.

THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE PRESENTED TO THE FINANCE COMMITTEE FOR A DETAIL REVIEW. THE TREASURER THEN PRESENTS THE FINANCIALS TO THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES WITH A RECOMMENDATION OF ACCEPTANCE AND THE BOARD APPROVES THE AUDITED FINANCIALS.
